messages.title: Who can we trust WITH OUR NHS?
messages.content: More cuts with LABOUR... Hospitals and GP practices are facing a squeeze on spending not seen for more than a decade, the Government revealed yesterday. Health and overseas aid budgets will not be immune from a programme of public spending cuts

messages.title: Our real action with Colin Eldridge
messages.content: Local campaigner, Colin Eldridge, has a record of success when it comes to fighting for our local health services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Colin Eldridge has a record of protecting our NHS, highlighting the spending squeeze on hospitals and GP practices expected under Labour.

mentions.candidate: Colin Eldridge is working with Lib Dem leader to get a better deal for Liverpool.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Gordon Brown is mentioned in contrast to policies.
mentions.tacticalSituation: The election in Liverpool will be between local Lib Dem, Colin Eldridge and London Labour's candidate. Conservatives are out of the race - They haven't won a Parliamentary election in Liverpool for 30 years.

issues.health: More cuts with LABOUR... Hospitals and GP practices are facing a squeeze on spending not seen for more than a decade, the Government revealed yesterday.

leaflet.personalStatement: I firmly believe that without the involvement of yourself... we would not have had today's announcement. We tried to engage politicians across the political parties but in the end, none came to the table with a passion and energy to engage with the campaign you have.

endorsements.endorsement: Your involvement and passion engaged with the campaign.

quotes.text: They [The Conservatives] know they're not going to win a seat in Liverpool in the general election.
quotes.source: David Bartlett, Echo City Editor, March 2010

quotes.text: It will take a minor miracle for them [The Conservatives] to win here.
quotes.source: Andrew Garnett, Wavertree Conservative Party candidate

images.caption: Colin Eldridge with Lib Dem leader
